SEARCH
Module AM08
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Interface RMILobbyServerInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
LobbyServer
public interface RMILobbyServerInterface extends Remote
This interface contains the methods that can be called by the client on the Lobby Server

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    chooseNickname(String nickname)
    This method is called by the client to choose a nickname
    String
    createGame(Integer numPlayers, String nickname, RmiClientInterface client)
    This method is called by the client to create a new game
    List<Lobby>
    getLobbies(String nickname)
    This method is called by the client get the list of available games
    String
    joinGame(String nickname, RmiClientInterface client, String gameIndex)
    This method is called by the client to join a game
    String
    recoverGame(String nickname, RmiClientInterface rmiClient)
    This method is called by the client to recover a game

  • Method Details

    • chooseNickname

      boolean chooseNickname(String nickname) throws RemoteException, ExistentNicknameException, IllegalNicknameException
      This method is called by the client to choose a nickname
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname chosen by the player
      Returns:
      true if the nickname is valid, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the connection is lost
      ExistentNicknameException - if the nickname is already taken
      IllegalNicknameException - if the nickname is illegal

    • createGame

      String createGame(Integer numPlayers, String nickname, RmiClientInterface client) throws RemoteException, AlreadyInGameException, NonExistentNicknameException
      This method is called by the client to create a new game
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - the number of players in the game
      nickname - the nickname of the player who created the game
      client - the client who created the game
      Returns:
      lobby name
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the connection is lost
      AlreadyInGameException - if the player is already in a game
      NonExistentNicknameException - if the nickname is not valid

    • joinGame

      String joinGame(String nickname, RmiClientInterface client, String gameIndex) throws RemoteException, NoGamesAvailableException, AlreadyInGameException, NonExistentNicknameException, NoGameToRecoverException, WrongLobbyIndexException, LobbyFullException
      This method is called by the client to join a game
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player who wants to join the game
      client - the client who wants to join the game
      gameIndex - the index of the game to join
      Returns:
      lobby name
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the connection is lost
      NoGamesAvailableException - if there are no games available
      AlreadyInGameException - if the player is already in a game
      NonExistentNicknameException - if the nickname is not valid
      NoGameToRecoverException - if there are no games available for recovery
      WrongLobbyIndexException - if the lobby index is not valid
      LobbyFullException - if the lobby is full

    • getLobbies

      List<Lobby> getLobbies(String nickname) throws RemoteException, NoGamesAvailableException
      This method is called by the client get the list of available games
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player who wants to get the list of available games
      Returns:
      the list of available games
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the connection is lost
      NoGamesAvailableException - if there are no games available

    • recoverGame

      String recoverGame(String nickname, RmiClientInterface rmiClient) throws RemoteException, NoGameToRecoverException
      This method is called by the client to recover a game
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player who wants to recover the game
      rmiClient - the client who wants to recover the game
      Returns:
      lobby name
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the connection is lost
      NoGameToRecoverException - if there are no games available for recovery
